title: Reason why this game is getting worse and worse
body:
My guess is that Riot now cares only about chinesse/korean players, adding ridiculous and childish new champions, tons of mobility, making this game way too dynamic. League is getting really popular in Asia and that's why they don't care about us, EU/NA players anymore. This game is now targeting them, since asians love dynamic, colorful, childish, epileptic stuff. (the more sh1t is going on the screen the better)

**FYI League owner is now Tencent, chinesse leech that gradually sucks all the best out of our beloved, old but gold League that americans have invented.**

This same copy pasta conspiracy needs to stop. Internet cafe industry died in China a few years back, because contrary to what everyone likes to believe that China somehow has no personal computers or something, people indeed were playing games at home which caused the collapse of the local internet cafe industry.

Its resurgence the last couple years were however, less about people wanting to game at the internet cafes, but more about people trying to watch video game tournaments live with other gamers.

Not to mention, Dota/Dota2 is and has always been super popular in China more than anywhere else in the world. Dota's longer game length never bothered Chinese players, why would League's already faster pacing since its dawn remotely bother them? This constantly thrown around claim that Chinese players want shorter games is utter nonsense, because it does not add up to what's actually happening at all.

This kind of "let's blame China just because it's easy, and we'll make up bullshit to rationalise it" needs to end.

If anything, it is more likely that Riot is led by the Korean's habit of playing than Chinese players. Because it is very true that Korean players rarely ever touch Dota and similar games with longer game sessions, as well as use internet cafes more routinely than Chinese players for whatever reason. So if you have to blame someone, at least start with the more likely candidate.

But whatever you want to speculate, this game's current state is simply due to Riot turning it into a TV show and a serious hard on for esports. Esports is what killed this game, as it has done with MANY others. Your silly little blame game can take a backseat.
